Title: Global warming: July was Earth's hottest month in modern times
Content: Soaring temperatures worldwide made July the Earth's hottest month in modern times, setting a new high mark for global heat in 137 years of record-keeping, US government scientists said on Wednesday.
Author: AFP
Description: Soaring temperatures worldwide made July the Earth's hottest month in modern times, setting a new high mark for global heat in 137 years of record-keeping, US government scientists said on Wednesday.
